posts.post_content:
This wasnt reprinted as [Tower of Calamities](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Tower of Calamities), its part of a 4 card cycle. The flavor is there, but the effect is lacking.  
  
[Tower of Fortunes](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Tower of Fortunes) Blue  
[Tower of Eons](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Tower of Eons) White  
[Tower of Murmurs](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Tower of Murmurs) Black  
  
[Tower of Calamities](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Tower of Calamities) simply completed the cycle by being the red tower.
